spells.name: Burrow
spells.description: Target gains a burrow speed of 15.

spells.name: Eruptive Pustules
spells.description: Acid boils burst when you are attacked.

spells.name: Marionette Possession
spells.description: As magic jar, but limited to line of sight.

spells.name: Monstrous Physique I
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium monstrous humanoid.

spells.name: Undead Anatomy I
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium undead.
